INSERT INTO mountain (no, mname, mloc, height, status, description) VALUES (#{no}, #{mname}, #{mloc}, #{height}, #{status}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE mountain SET mname = #{mname}, mloc = #{mloc}, height = #{height}, status = #{status}, description = #{description} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mountain WHERE no > 0 ORDER BY no DESC

SELECT no, mname, mloc, height, status, description FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY no DESC) rn, no, mname, mloc, height, status, description FROM mountain
) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{curPage} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{curPage} * #{amount}
SELECT no, mname FROM mountain ORDER BY mname

SELECT mountain_no, mname, sum(conquestcnt) conquestcnt FROM ( SELECT mountain_no, conquestcnt, mname FROM conquest c JOIN mountain m ON c.mountain_no = m.no WHERE c.member_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY m.mname ) GROUP BY mountain_no, mname ORDER BY mname
